CAMEO.DESCRIBE:
Register for free.
Without obligation.
Easy and secure communication. Mobile and desktop
Connect with all your contacts.
Explore our smart features.
Register today!

INFO.TERMS: You need to accept the terms of use.

WELCOME.HEADLINE: Welcome to cameoNet!
WELCOME.TEXT_1: cameoNet is an open source messenger that provides end-to-end encryption for safe, private and commercial Communication!
WELCOME.TEXT_2: Attention: this is a first beta version!
WELCOME.TEXT_3: The app may contain errors, the user interface is still under development and many new features will be added in the next versions. We cannot guarantee the safety of your data. Please copy all your important data.
WELCOME.TEXT_4: Please help us to improve cameoNet!
WELCOME.TEXT_5:
We are happy about every error or improvement you post on http://support.cameonet.de
the cameoNet-Team.

QUICKSTART.HEADLINE: Quick Start
QUICKSTART.SUB_TEXT: Just a few operations are required to design your first secure talk:
QUICKSTART.TEXT_1: An individual cameoKey is needed for all members of a secure talk. You don't have one? Please open Settings > cameoKeys.
QUICKSTART.TEXT_2: To find friends or peers please press 'Add Contact' in the app header and choose 'Search cameoNet' to select the cameoID or display name. If you have selected one, please send him a 'Friend Request'.
QUICKSTART.TEXT_3:
You can send messages to contacts from your contact list by clicking the 'Add Mail' icon right to the contact. A new talk will be opened. Please enter a subject (optional), write a message and press on the 'Send Button (paper plane)'.

Congratulations! You have just led your first encrypted talk!
QUICKSTART.TEXT_4: If you have any questions regarding our service, please feel free to let us a short notice through our platform at http://support.cameonet.de.

KEYINFO.SKIP_CHECKBOX_TEXT: Don't show me this page again

EXPLANATION.UNTRUSTED_KEYS:
For this identity you already obtain cameoKeys. These keys are installed on other devices and are not trusted at the moment.
To read encrypted talks on all of your devices, please link the cameoKeys together.
EXPLANATION.ALL_KEYS_TRUSTED: For '{{Identity}}' you have a cameoKey that allows you to read all encrypted talks on your device.

KEYLIST.LABEL_OTHERKEYS: cameoKeys on other devices/ other browsers or apps

START.HEADLINE: Generate cameoKey
START.EXPLANATION:
On this device you don't have a cameoKey tied to this identity.
For secure communication please generate or import a cameoKey first.

GENERATING.HEADLINE: Generation of cameoKey in progress!
GENERATING.EXPLANATION:
Please be patient. This process can take some time according to the technical parameter of your device and the size of the cameoKey.
If it lasts more than 5 minutes, you may stop the process and start again.

SAVE.HEADLINE: cameoKey was generated successfully!
SAVE.EXPLANATION: Each cameoKey consists of a private part that will be stored on your device only and a public part that has to be transferred and stored on our server.
SAVE.NOTE: To avoid loss of encrypted data please open your cameoKey and copy it's private part to a safe place on your computer - we recommend to use a password safe.

AUTHENTICATION.HEADLINE: Link cameoKey
AUTHENTICATION.EXPLANATION: To read encrypted messages written under '{{identity}}' on other devices, please link the local cameoKey with all other keys that you are using there.

START.INSTRUCTIONS: Please press 'Link up' to start the process.
START.NOTE: Attention! Before pressing 'Link up' you should first choose your identity '{{identity}}' from the header!

REQUEST_STARTED.INSTRUCTIONS: Please press 'Abort request' to stop the process.
REQUEST_STARTED.NOTE: Request has been started. Please confirm the request on the other device.

ACCEPT_REQUEST.INSTRUCTIONS:
On another device a cameoKey is stored that is not linked to this device. Therefore it is not possible to read encrypted data on this device and vice versa.
Do you want to link your local cameoKey '{{cameoKey}}' with the other device?
ACCEPT_REQUEST.NOTE: To link cameoKeys, please start the link up process.

SHOW_TRANSACTION_SECRET.INSTRUCTIONS: Please press 'Stop linking' to stop the process.
SHOW_TRANSACTION_SECRET.NOTE: Please enter the code into the other device:

ENTER_TRANSACTION_SECRET.NOTE: Please enter the code displayed on the other device:

SUCCESSFUL.INSTRUCTIONS: You have successfully linked your cameoKey! In a few seconds, all previous talks that have been created by the linked cameoKeys will be egible.

TRUST.HEADLINE: TODO

ENTER_TRANSACTION_SECRET.NOTE: Geben Sie bitte den Code, der Ihnen auf dem anderen Gerät angezeigt wird, hier ein:

SUCCESSFUL.INSTRUCTIONS: Die Verknüpfung der cameoKeys war erfolgreich! Die bisherigen Talks können in Kürze mit allen verknüpften cameoKeys lesabar sein.
SUCCESSFUL.NOTE: Sie können den Dialog nun schließen.

TRUST.TIMEOUT: The process will be canceld in {{timeout}}.

WARN.FAILED: The creating of new identity has failed. Please try again later.

KEYS.NO_LOCALKEYS_ON_THIS_DEVICE: TODO There is no cameoKey on this device for your identity. Here you can generate or import a cameoKey for better security.
KEYS.UNTRUSTED_PUBLICKEYS_EXISTS:
You have cameoKeys for this identity on several devides that are not authenticated. You cannot read messages written and encrypted on devices with not authenticated cameoKeys.
To authenticate a cameoKey click on next to the cameoKey in the list below.
KEYS.EXPORT_KEY_DESCRIPTION: Export your private cameoKey. Please make sure to keep it save. You can use to recover your encrypted data.
KEYS.STOREKEY_DESCRIPTION:
The cameoKey consists of a public and a private part. The private will be stored only on this device. It is important to keep it secret since it can decrypt all your data.
The private key can be exported for data recovery if the device is lost.

HANDSHAKE.HANDSHAKE_NOW:
Do you want to authenticate this device against '{{device}}' now, to be able to read all talks written and encrypted on these devices by each other?
Please start the device '{{device}}' with the same identity '{{identity}}'.
HANDSHAKE.CHOOSE_OLD_DEVICE: Please select a device with which you want to perform the authentication!
HANDSHAKE.TRANSACTION_SECRET: To authenticate this device please enter the following code in the input field on your other device:
HANDSHAKE.HANDSHAKE_RECEIVED: Would you like to start the authentication?
HANDSHAKE.HANDSHAKE_NEED_TRANSACTID: To authenticate your new device please enter the code below:

INFO.EMPTY: Please add a Password and confirm it

INFO.INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER: The entered value does not seem to be a phone number.
INFO.EMPTY: The phone number field is empty

INFO.MAX_LETTER_COUNT: Please use a maximum of {{count}} characters.

INPUT.EXISTS: Your input already exists! Please choose another.
INPUT.EMPTY: This field is required. Please fill out
INPUT.INVALID: Invalid input. Avoid spaces and special characters.

INFO.DISPLAYNAME_EXISTS: The display name already exists in your constact book.

EMPTY.NAME: Name is empty.
EMPTY.PHONE_OR_EMAIL: Please enter a phone number or a email address.

BULK_REKEYING.CONTENT: The talks on this device are being encrypted for the new cameoKey.

KEY_REQUEST.CONTENT:
There is a new cameoKey on this device which needs to be authenticated by another device. This is necessary to read all existing talks. Do you want to authenticate this cameoKey now?
Please start another device with the same identity '{{identity}}'.

KEY_RESPONSE.CONTENT:
An other device which pretends to be yours asked to be authenticated by this device. After that your new device gets access to all of your encrypted talks.
Do you want to authenticate the following device?

KEY_REQUEST_3RD.CONTENT: Do you want to trust(Request)? TODO: translate

JOB.IN_PROGRESS: You have edited this site without saving. Do you really want to leave this page?
JOB.FILES_IN_UPLOAD_PROGRESS: Files are being uploaded. Do you really want to leave this page?

KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.NAME: Encryption relies on a password.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION_NEW: Encryption with a password is not bad in itself, but the strength of the encryption greatly depends on the password you choose. You have to use a password because not all recipients have a proper key available to you.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION: Encryption with a password is not bad in itself, but the strength of the encryption greatly depends on the password you choose. You have to use a password because not all recipients had a proper a key available when the conversation started.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION_PRIVATE_KEY_MISSING: You do not have a cameoKey on this device.

NO_SYMMETRIC_KEY_TRANSMISSION.NAME: This talk is safely encrypted with cameoKeys.

HAS_PASSCAPTCHA.NAME: PassCaptcha enabled.
HAS_PASSCAPTCHA.DESCRIPTION: Using the passCaptcha method makes it harder to automatically decrypt your messages on a large scale, but it is not actually save.

WELCOME.MESSAGE:
Hello, I am the cameoNet support. 

If you have any questions or problems do not hesitate to reply on this message. You can also use our help system at http://support.cameonet.de,

the cameoNet team.
